Last week, it was Virginia Beach. But day after day and year after year, too many families and communities are shattered by senseless gun violence. We can't get numb to this. On National Gun Violence Awareness Day, pledge to speak out, #WearOrange — and vote — to protect lives.

Every year, Everytown and our partner organizations wear orange both to honor those affected by gun violence, and demand a future free from it. Join us — wear orange on Friday, June 7 and find an event near you throughout Wear Orange Weekend. https://t.co/ny7XNf1WTX #WearOrange
